title: "Your Shop" Price bugs.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The "Your Shop" on the main menu's prices are bugged for me. And are not on the said discounts they are said to be on as such. I was wondering if i could have this fixed, and my shop reset, because for one, I dont use any of these champions so i have less insentive to buy any skins for them. For two, things like 750 skins being labeled as 1620 and being on a 40% discount is just.... yeah. Weird. Seeing as ive never had an issue here before. Im glad i didnt just go ahead and buy something (only champion i play here is poppy and i dont want to buy skins on a smurf account for a champion i have as a pocket pick, i save that for champions im adding to my main champion pool) Anyways, i would greatly appreciate it being fixed and possibly having my shop reset so that I have insentive to throw some toonies atcha guys

replies.body: It takes the prices of the champion as well if you dont own them. Thats why its priced "weirdly"!
That's correct - purchasing the champion outside of Your Shop with BE (or RP), would reduce the price when you get back into Your Shop.
